channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: TRIPSTARGRAM
channel.desc: Celebrating the 2023 Visit Korea Year, K-Pop stars will experience and look around regions in-person to introduce their beauty A time to delve into the charms of the ten hidden regions in Korea, introducing fine sceneries and cuisines that will captivate tourists who love Korea and Hallyu(Korean Wave), and even a mission to add curiosity An unforgettable trip in Korea with global stars, \"TripstarGram\"!!
